{{Infobox battle item |name = Miracle Seed |image = [[File:Miracle Seed.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Miracle Seed''. |location =
*[[Miracle Seed#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''Miracle Seed''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to [[File:Grass_Type_icon.png|30px]] Grass type Pokémon. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 10%. == Acquisition == ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Items}} {{LootItem|Sprout Tower|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Petalburg Woods|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Pinwheel Forest|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Lush Jungle|Legendary}} |} |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
